document_title: Delayed menstruation (late menstruation): Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_name: cham-kinh.json_7_How to have a regular menstrual cycle?
subsection_content:
To have a regular monthly menstrual cycle, women should keep their private areas clean, especially during menstruation, before and after sex. You should use feminine hygiene solutions with appropriate pH levels. Absolutely do not douche deep inside the vagina because it can easily make the virus penetrate and cause infection in the private area.
In addition, women need to build and maintain a healthy lifestyle, such as eating scientifically, supplementing nutrients, exercising in moderation combined with rest and sleep. reasonable. You should stay away and do not use harmful stimulants such as alcohol, coffee, cigarettes, etc.
Women should learn about relaxation therapies to help them not fall into a state of tension or prolonged stress. At the same time, comply with regular gynecological examinations at least every 6 months to detect gynecological diseases early, intervene promptly and effectively, and avoid negative effects on health and fertility.
Hopefully the above information has helped women understand what delayed menstruation is and how to get examined for proper treatment. If you have any questions or concerns, you can contact the Tam Anh General Hospital System hotline to receive support from good Obstetrics and Gynecology experts!
